mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    s = ''
    s_list = list(s)
    left = 0
    right = len(s_list) - 1
    while left < right:
        (s_list[left], s_list[right]) = (s_list[right], s_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    s = ''.join(s_list)
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = 'hello world'
    s_list = list(s)
    left = 1
    right = len(s_list) - 1
    while left < right:
        (s_list[left], s_list[right]) = (s_list[right], s_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    s = ''.join(s_list)
    return s
